entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is being accused by his uncle Vernon of doing something to Dudley.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle and is accusing him of doing something to Dudley. He has a menacing growl and narrowed eyes.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and is the one who got sick. Aunt Petunia is sponging sick from his leather jacket.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt and is trying to figure out what happened to Dudley. She has a quavering voice.

entities.name: diddy
entities.description: Diddy is a nickname for Dudley, used by Aunt Petunia.

entities.name: screech owl
entities.description: A screech owl swooped in through the kitchen window and dropped an envelope at Harry's feet.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is accusing Harry of doing something to Dudley. He says 'What have you done to my son?'
Harry is being accused of doing something to Dudley, but he denies it.
Aunt Petunia is concerned about what happened to Dudley and is trying to figure out if Harry was involved.
The screech owl delivered an envelope to Harry's feet, which suggests that it may be a message or a package for him.
